name: Hello and Goodbye
description:
Created with Unity. Sound created with bfxr and Adobe Audition CC. 

This project is hosted at: https://github.com/ThreeEyedVenelope/hello_and_goodbye

Fonts used:

AnonymousPro-BoldItalic
AnonymousPro-Italic
AnonymousPro-Regular

CormorantGaramond-Light

CormorantInfant-MediumItalic
CormorantInfant-Regular

DMMono-Light

DMMono-Regular

Geo-Regular

IMFellGreatPrimer-Regular

____

There are executable files for both Windows and Mac. I own Windows and not Mac so I didn't have a chance to test out the Mac build. Let me know if there are any issues with the Mac build.
